title: Minyak Sawit Keluarga (Palm Oil Family)
brief_description: Minyak Sawit Keluarga (Palm Oil Family), examines her paternal family’s history of farming practices in rural Southern Malaysia. Footage of domestic-scale palm oil plantations in Bagan (Johor State) is interspersed with visual and auditory recordings of funerary Taoist rituals, documents and interviews that consider the palm oil industry and relevant history of migration in the local area.
